summary.para: Called by the system when an audio system effects property changes.

param.name: type
param.para: A value from the specifying the type of the property store that triggered the callback.

param.name: key
param.para: A structure identifying the property that changed.

remarks.para: Register to receive callbacks by calling . Unregister the callback interface by calling .
This method will not be called if the registry is manually edited. A notification is generated only when is called on the associated default, user, or volatile property store.

summary.para: A callback interface implemented by clients to receive notifications when audio system effect properties change.

remarks.para: Register the interface to receive callbacks by calling . Unregister the callback interface by calling .
